import { createGlobalStyle } from "styled-components";
export const GlobalStyle = createGlobalStyle(["*,*::before,*::after{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box;}body{margin:0;font-family:'Poppins',-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,'Segoe UI','Roboto','Oxygen','Ubuntu','Cantarell','Fira Sans','Droid Sans','Helvetica Neue',sans-serif;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale;}a{text-decoration:none;}ul{list-style:none;}button{background-color:unset;border:none;}"]);
